items: Stand facing a bench or step with a dumbbell in each hand.
Place your right foot on the bench or step and step up, straightening your right leg.
As you step up, lift your left knee up towards your chest.
Lower your left foot back down to the ground and step your right foot back down to the ground.
Repeat on the other side, stepping up with your left foot and lifting your right knee up towards your chest.
Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

content.title: Dumbbell Lateral Step Up Form & Visual

items: Strengthens hamstrings
Improves knee stability
Targets glutes and lower back muscles
Can be done with minimal equipment
Allows for isolation of leg muscles

content.title: Dumbbell Lateral Step Up Muscles Worked

items: Quadriceps
Glutes
Hamstrings
Calves
Core

content.title: Dumbbell Lateral Step Up Variations & Alternatives

items: dumbbell lateral lunge
dumbbell step-up with knee raise
dumbbell reverse lunge with lateral raise
dumbbell curtsy lunge with lateral raise
dumbbell lateral box jump
